thread.title: Obama says he'll keep more troops in 'fragile' Afghanistan
thread.title_full: Obama says he'll keep more troops in 'fragile' Afghanistan

title: Obama says he'll keep more troops in 'fragile' Afghanistan
text: > Top News Obama says he'll keep more troops in 'fragile' Afghanistan President Barack Obama, with Joint Chiefs Chairman Gen. Joseph Dunford, left, and Defense Secretary Ash Carter, after speaking about Afghanistan, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, in the Roosevelt Room of the White House in Washington. Obama announced that he will keep U.S. troops in Afghanistan when he leaves office in 2017, casting aside his promise to end the war on his watch and instead ensuring he hands the conflict off to his successor. (AP Photo/Pablo Martinez Monsivais)
